attributes.action: Stop the moslem march in London.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The moslems are due to march in London this month to protest at so called British oppression.
This is in a country that has bent over backwards to appease them in many areas and even changed our ways and culture on occasions, i for one am sick of the government kowtowing to them.
If it was the BNP or similar they would have been stopped.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
